tool.name: ProteinResolver
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir fasta && ln -s '$fasta' 'fasta/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $fasta.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($fasta.ext)' && #if $in: mkdir in && ${ ' '.join(["ln -s '%s' 'in/%s.%s' &&" % (_, re.sub('[^\w\-_]', '_', _.element_identifier), $gxy2omsext(_.ext)) for _ in $in if _]) } #end if #if $design: mkdir design && ln -s '$design' 'design/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $design.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($design.ext)' && #end if #if $protein_groups_FLAG: mkdir protein_groups && #end if #if $peptide_table_FLAG: mkdir peptide_table && #end if #if $protein_table_FLAG: mkdir protein_table && #end if #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts_cond.additional_info_FLAG: mkdir additional_info && #end if #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && echo ARGS && cat '$args_json' && echo HARD && cat '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -fasta 'fasta/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $fasta.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($fasta.ext)' #if $in: -in ${' '.join(["'in/%s.%s'"%(re.sub('[^\w\-_]', '_', _.element_identifier), $gxy2omsext(_.ext)) for _ in $in if _])} #end if #if $design: -design 'design/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $design.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($design.ext)' #end if #if $protein_groups_FLAG: -protein_groups 'protein_groups/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' #end if #if $peptide_table_FLAG: -peptide_table 'peptide_table/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' #end if #if $protein_table_FLAG: -protein_table 'protein_table/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' #end if #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts_cond.additional_info_FLAG: -additional_info 'additional_info/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' #end if #end if #if not($protein_groups_FLAG) and not($peptide_table_FLAG) and not($protein_table_FLAG) and not($adv_opts_cond.additional_info_FLAG): | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing #if $protein_groups_FLAG: && mv 'protein_groups/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' '$protein_groups' #end if #if $peptide_table_FLAG: && mv 'peptide_table/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' '$peptide_table' #end if #if $protein_table_FLAG: && mv 'protein_table/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' '$protein_table' #end if #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts_cond.additional_info_FLAG: && mv 'additional_info/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' '$additional_info' #end if #end if #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced' and $adv_opts_cond.ctd_out_FLAG && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: in_path
param.label: Path to idXMLs or consensusXMLs files

param.name: design
param.label: Text file containing the experimental design
param.help: See documentation for specific format requirements select txt data sets(s)

param.name: protein_groups_FLAG
param.label: Generate output protein_groups (output file. Contains all protein groups)

param.name: peptide_table_FLAG
param.label: Generate output peptide_table (output file)
param.help: Contains one peptide per line and all proteins which contain that peptide

param.name: protein_table_FLAG
param.label: Generate output protein_table (output file. Contains one protein per line)

section.name: designer
section.title: Additional options for quantitative experimental design

param.name: separator
param.label: Separator, which should be used to split a row into columns

param.name: additional_info_FLAG
param.label: Generate output additional_info (output file for additional info)

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: stdout
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: stdout
data.filter: not (protein_groups_FLAG) and not (peptide_table_FLAG) and not (protein_table_FLAG) and not (adv_opts_cond['adv_opts_selector'] == 'advanced' and adv_opts_cond['additional_info_FLAG'])

tool.help:
protein inference
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/documentation/TOPP_ProteinResolver.html
